S04jnalokau:124: śakrasya devānām indrasya pratibhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvāñjalipragṛhaṃ kuryuḥ /

S04jnalokau:126: vayam apy evaṃrūpā bhavema yādṛśaḥ śakro devānām indraḥ,
S04jnalokau:127: vayam apy evaṃ vaijayante prāsāde krīḍema ramema parivārayema yathāyaṃ śakro devānām indra iti /
S04jnalokau:128: na ca te sattvā evaṃ saṃjānanti sma /

S04jnalokau:132: te śakratvam abhinandanto dānāni ca dadati,

S04jnalokau:139: api tu pariśuddhatvād mahāvaiḍūryasya saṃdṛśyate trayastriṃśadbhavanam,
S04jnalokau:142: sa cāsan notpanno na niruddhaḥ pariśuddhatvād mahāvaiḍūryasya pratibhāsaḥ saṃdṛśyate /

S04jnalokau:145: sa cābhūto 'nutpanno 'niruddho na bhāvo nābhāvo na dṛśyo nādṛśyo na lokyo nālokyo na caityo nācaityo na san nāsan /

S04jnalokau:154: tadyathā mañjuśrīs tatra mahāvaiḍūryamayāṃ mahāpṛthivyāṃ śakrasya devānām indrasya pratibhāso neñjati,
S04jnalokau:160: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho neñjati,
S04jnalokau:167: atha ca pratibimba iva lokeṣu dṛśyate /
S04jnalokau:175: tadyathā mañjuśrīr devānāṃ trayastriṃśānāṃ puṇyabalapariniṣpannānāṃ dharmaśabdānāṃ mahādharmadundubhir upari vaijayantasya prasādasyāntarīkṣagatā cakṣuḥpathasamatikrāntā,
S04jnalokau:178: atha ca punar mañjuśrīḥ sā mahādharmadundubhiḥ /
S04jnalokau:179: yasmin [JĀA_29] samaye devās trayastriṃśatkāyikā tīvrasatatasamitaṃ divyaiḥ kāmakrīḍāratiparibhogaiḥ pramattā bhavanti,

S04jnalokau:181: śakraś ca yadā devānām indro divyaiḥ kāmakrīḍaratiparibhogaiḥ pramatto bhavati,

S04jnalokau:198_2: śabdena sarve trayastriṃśatkāyikā devāḥ saṃcoditā bhītās trastā udvignodvignāḥ [JĀA_30]

S04jnalokau:208: yena śabdenāsurā bhītās trastā udvignodvignāḥ palāyanti /

S04jnalokau:211: atha ca mañjuśrīs trayastriṃśatkāyikānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ pūrvaparikarmakṛtānāṃ mahādharmadundubheḥ śabdo niścarati /
S04jnalokau:213: yathā mañjuśrīs tasyā mahādundubher adṛśyo 'nātmabhāvo 'nālokyo 'sann abhūto 'cinto 'cetano 'nimitto [JĀA_31] 'rūpy aruto 'bhāvo 'dvayaś cakṣuḥpathasamatikrāntaḥ,

S04jnalokau:217: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho 'dṛśyo 'nālokyo 'nātmabhāvo 'sann abhūto 'citto 'cetano 'nimitto 'rūpy aruto 'dvayo 'bhāvaś cakṣuḥpathasamatikrāntaḥ /
S04jnalokau:218: atha ca mañjuśrīḥ sattvāḥ pūrvakarmavipākena yathāśayādhimuktyā dharmaśabdaṃ niścarantaṃ saṃjānanti /
S04jnalokau:219: sa ca dharmaśabdaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ sarvopadravopāyāsopakleśopaśāntaye saṃvartate /
S04jnalokau:220: dharmasvaranirghoṣeṇa tathāgataghoṣasvara iti loke saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /

S04jnalokau:253_2: ca sattvānāṃ nirvāṇamārgasaṃdarśanahetukānām āsaṃgapratibhānas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho

S04jnalokau:264: na mañjuśrīs tathāgata utpadyate vā nirudhyate vā /

S04jnalokau:282: tena khalu punar mañjuśrīḥ samayena sarveṣu devanikāyeṣu sarvadevaputrāḥ svakasvakān kāmakrīḍāratiparibhogāṃs tyaktvā sarvatūryatāḍāvacarasaṃgītiṃ praśamayitvā,
S04jnalokau:283: kāmakrīḍāratimanasikārotsṛṣṭāḥ sagauravā añjaliṃ pragṛhya mahābrahmāṇam animiṣaṃ vyavalokayanti sma /
S04jnalokau:284: sa ca mahābrahmā sarvadevanikāyeṣu muhūrtaṃ darśanaṃ dadāti,
S04jnalokau:286: te ca devaputrās tasmin samaye mahābrahmalokopapattim ākāṅkṣanti,
S04jnalokau:290: atha ca mañjuśrīḥ sarvadevanikāyeṣu darśanābhāso bhavati,
S04jnalokau:291: tasyaiva mahābrahmaṇaḥ pūrvakuśalamūlapraṇidhānādhiṣṭhānena teṣāṃ ca devaputrāṇāṃ pūrvakuśalamūlopacayena /
S04jnalokau:292: na ca mañjuśrīs teṣāṃ devaputrāṇām evaṃ bhavati /
S04jnalokau:295: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgato 'py arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ śūnyo vaśiko 'bhūto 'nakṣaro 'ghoṣo 'deśo 'bhāvo 'cintyo 'nimittaś cittamanovijñānāpagato 'nutpanno 'niruddhaḥ /
S04jnalokau:296: atha ca punar mañjuśrīs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ pūrvabodhisattvacaryāpraṇidhānādhiṣṭhānena,
S04jnalokau:299: na ca mañjuśrīr ādikarmikāṇāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ sarvabālapṛthagjanānāṃ caivaṃ bhavati /
S04jnalokau:301: atha ca mañjuśrīs tathāgatātmabhāvāl lakṣaṇaśatasahasrālaṃkṛtāt sarvatathāgateryāpatheṣu śūnyeṣu nānāvidhivicitrāṇāṃ nānādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ mahādharmadeśanā niścarati /
S04jnalokau:302: sā ca dharmadeśanā sarvasattvānāṃ sarvopadravopāyāsopakleśopaśāntaye saṃvartate /
S04jnalokau:303: tatra ca tathāgataḥ samayaḥ sarvatropekṣako nirvikalpo nirviśeṣaḥ /
S04jnalokau:304: tad anenāpi te mañjuśrīḥ paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam,
S04jnalokau:307: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyām ime gāthe abhāṣat /
S04jnalokau:309: anutpādadharmaḥ satataṃ tathāgataḥ sarve ca dharmāḥ sugatena sādṛśāḥ /
S04jnalokau:310: nimittagrāheṇa tu bālabuddhayo asatsu dharmeṣu caranti loke // 1 //
S04jnalokau:311: tathāgato hi pratibimbabhūtaḥ kuśalasya dharmasya anāsravasya /
S04jnalokau:312: na cātra tathatā na tathāgato 'sti bimbaṃ ca saṃdṛśyati sarvaloke // 2 //
S04jnalokau:314: tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ sūryaraśmayo jambūdvīpe pūrvataram eva tāvad mahāśailendrarājānam avabhāsayanti /
S04jnalokau:317: tataḥ paścād iha jambūdvīpe nimnān pṛthivīpradeśān avabhāsayanti /
S04jnalokau:318: te ca mañjuśrīḥ sūryaraśmayo na kalpayanti,
S04jnalokau:338: atha ca punar mañjuśrīḥ pṛthivyām uccanīcamadhyaviśeṣeṇa hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭāvabhāsasya cchāyā vaicitryaṃ bhavati /
S04jnalokau:339: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgato 'py arhan samyaksaṃbuddho na kalpayati,
S04jnalokau:378: atha ca punar mañjuśrīs tathāgatasūryamaṇḍalajñānaraśmayas traidhātuke 'nantamadhyadharmadhātvapratihataraśmyavabhāsapramuktāḥ /
S04jnalokau:379: prasṛtāś ca raśmayaḥ pūrvataram eva mahāśailendrakalpādhyāśayānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ kāye nipatanti /
S04jnalokau:382: tataḥ paścāt kuśalādhyāśayānāṃ yathādhimuktīnāṃ sattvānāṃ kāye nipatanti /
S04jnalokau:383: tataḥ paścād antaśo mithyātvaniyateṣu sattvasaṃtāneṣu kāye tathāgatasūryamaṇḍalaraśmayo nipatanti /
S04jnalokau:386: tatra ca tathāgato mañjuśrīḥ samaḥ sarvatropekṣako nirvikalpo nirviśeṣaḥ /
S04jnalokau:400: kuśalākuśalāśayānāṃ ca sattvānām āśayaṃ viditvā viśodhayiṣyāmi,
S04jnalokau:402: yāvad mithyātvaniyatānām api sattvānāṃ yathānurūpaṃ dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmi /
S04jnalokau:406: atha ca mañjuśrīḥ sattvānāṃ kuśalāśayasaṃtānavaicitryāt tathāgatajñānasūryamaṇḍalaraśmyavabhāsasya vaicitryaṃ bhavati //
S04jnalokau:408: tadyathā mañjuśrīr asti mahāsāgare sarvābhiprāyaparipūraṇaṃ nāma mahāmaṇiratnaṃ tad dhvajāgrāvabaddham /
S04jnalokau:410: tādṛśaṃ tataḥ [JĀA_41] śabdaṃ niścarantaṃ sattvāḥ saṃjānanti /
S04jnalokau:411: tac ca mahāmaṇiratnaṃ na kalpayati na vikalpayati na cintayati na vicintayati,
S04jnalokau:413: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgato na kalpayati na vikalpayati na cintayati na vicintayati,
S04jnalokau:442: na nāma na rūpaṃ na nimittam,
S04jnalokau:451: atha ca mañjuśrīs tathāgatajñānaratnam adhyāśayapariśuddhaṃ mahākaruṇādhvajāgrāvabaddham,
S04jnalokau:452: tato yo yathāśayādhimuktaḥ sattvaḥ sa tathā dharmadeśanāṃ niścarantīṃ saṃjānāti /
S04jnalokau:453: tatra ca tathāgataḥ samaḥ sarvatropekṣako nirvikalpo nirviśeṣaḥ //
S04jnalokau:455: tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ pratiśrutkām anyarutavijñaptito niścarantīṃ sattvāḥ saṃjānanti /
S04jnalokau:456: sā ca nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā,
S04jnalokau:468: na pṛthivīdhātur nābdhātur na tejodhātur na vāyudhātuḥ,
S04jnalokau:489: atha ca mañjuśrīḥ pratiśrutkā nānārutaghoṣā nānādhyāśayānāṃ sattvānāṃ nānārutaghoṣavijñaptito niścarati /
S04jnalokau:491: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho nātīto nānāgato na pratyutpannaḥ,
S04jnalokau:503: na pṛthivīdhātur nābdhātur na tejodhātur na vāyudhātuḥ,
S04jnalokau:525: atha ca mañjuśrīr nānāvimuktāḥ sattvā nānādhyāśayavijñaptitas tathāgatavācaṃ niścarantīṃ saṃjānanti //
S04jnalokau:527: tadyathāpi mañjuśrīḥ pṛthivīṃ niśritya pṛthivīṃ pratiṣṭhāya sarvatṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatayo vṛddhiṃ virūḍhiṃ vaipulyatām āpadyante /
S04jnalokau:532: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgataṃ niśritya tathāgataṃ pratiṣṭhāya sarvasattvānāṃ sarvakuśalamūlāni vṛddhiṃ virūḍhiṃ vaipulyatām āpadyante /
S04jnalokau:533: śrāvakayānikānāṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ vā mahāyānikānāṃ vā,
S04jnalokau:535: yāni cānyāny antaśo mithyātvaniyatānāṃ kuśalamūlāni sarvāṇi tāni tathāgataṃ niśritya tathāgataṃ pratiṣṭhāya vṛddhiṃ virūḍhiṃ vaipulyatām āpadyante /
S04jnalokau:551: tadyathā mañjuśrīr ākāśaṃ sarvatra samaṃ nirvikalpaṃ nirviśeṣam,
S04jnalokau:575: atha mañjuśrīḥ sattvāḥ saṃsthānasya hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭatayākāśaṃ hīnotkṛṣṭaṃ saṃjānanti /
S04jnalokau:576: evam eva mañjuśrīs tathāgato 'py arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvatra samo nirviśeṣaḥ,
S04jnalokau:595: atha ca mañjuśrīr ye hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭāśayāḥ sattvās te hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭaṃ tathāgataṃ paśyanti //
S04jnalokau:614: evaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntiṃ vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ ca /
S04jnalokau:625: na mañjuśrīs tathāgatasya nāmarūpaniruktyānusāri vijñānaṃ pravartate /
S04jnalokau:629: sarvadharmasamatākoṭī mañjuśrīs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddhaḥ samaḥ sarvatra nirvikalpo nirviśeṣaḥ,
S04jnalokau:636: yā mañjuśrīr anupalabdhiḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sā samatā,
S04jnalokau:642: evaṃ darśinaś ca viparyastāc cittacaitasikā na pravartante /
S04jnalokau:646: yadā na pracarati tadā na saṃcarati /
S04jnalokau:647: yadā na saṃcarati tadā na visarati /
S04jnalokau:657: yaś ca niyāmaprāptaḥ sa sarvadharmamanasikāraiḥ sārdhaṃ na saṃvasati /
S04jnalokau:658: yadā sarvadharmamanasikāraiḥ sārdhaṃ na saṃvasati tadā saṃvāśyo na bhavati /
S04jnalokau:659: yadā saṃvāśyo na bhavati tadā na bhavati na vibhavati /
S04jnalokau:660: yadā na bhavati na vibhavati tadā sthito dharmaprāpto bhavati /
S04jnalokau:661: yadā sthito dharmaprāpto bhavati tadā yoniśodharmaprayukto bhavati /
S04jnalokau:662: yoniśodharmaprayuktasya na kaścid dharmo 'sti yo na buddhadharmaḥ /
S04jnalokau:676: na tatra prayogo na pramāṇaṃ na phalasākṣātkriyā /
S04jnalokau:678: prakṛtiprabhāsvaraṃ cittaṃ tac cāgantukair upakleśair upakliśyate na ca prakṛtiḥ saṃkliśyate /
S04jnalokau:680: yā cāsaṃkleśatā tatra pratipakṣo nāsti yena pratipakṣeṇa kleśaprahāṇaṃ syāt /
S04jnalokau:682: na śuddhaḥ śudhyati śuddha eva saḥ /
S04jnalokau:685: yaś cāninditaḥ sa nandīprahāṇaṃ tatra sarvasnehā nirudhyante /
S04jnalokau:691: tathatāpratiṣṭhitāś ca sarvadharmāḥ saṃskṛtā asaṃskṛtāś ca /
S04jnalokau:692: yā ca tathatā na tatra saṃskṛtaṃ nāsaṃskṛtaṃ na dvayaprajñaptiḥ /
S04jnalokau:693: yatra na saṃskṛtaṃ nāsaṃskṛtaṃ na dvayaprajñaptiḥ sā tathatā /
S04jnalokau:700: yā najātutathatā sā na saṃkliśyate na viśudhyate /
S04jnalokau:701: yā na saṃkliśyate na viśudhyate sā notpadyate na nirudhyate /
S04jnalokau:702: yā notpadyate na nirudhyate sā nirvāṇena samā /
S04jnalokau:703: yā nirvāṇena samā sā na saṃsarati na parinirvāti /
S04jnalokau:704: yā na saṃsarati na parinirvāti sā nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā /
S04jnalokau:705: yā nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā sā na hīnā na madhyā notkṛṣṭā /
S04jnalokau:706: yā na hīnā na madhyā notkṛṣṭā sā tathatā //
S04jnalokau:710: tathaiva tathatā cātmā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram /
S04jnalokau:719: yad arthānugamajñānaṃ vijñānānugamaṃ cedam ucyate jñānam /
S04jnalokau:724: yārthānugamajñānena vijñānānugamajñānena nītārthānugamajñānena ca sā dharmatā /
S04jnalokau:753: tatra bodhisattvena saṃkleśahetur vyavadānahetuś ca parijñātavyaḥ /
S04jnalokau:754: saṃkleśahetuviśuddhyā ca vyavadānaviśuddhyā ca na sthātavyam//
S04jnalokau:779: sarve te dharmāḥ prakṛtiśūnyā niḥsattvā nirjīvā niṣpoṣā niṣpuruṣā niṣpudgalā asvāmikā aparigrahā nirvyāpārā māyopamā alakṣaṇā adhyātmopaśāntāḥ /
S04jnalokau:790: na kaścin mañjuśrīr dharmaḥ saṃvidyate yasyotpādo nirodho vā bhavet //
S04jnalokau:794: tat kathaṃ bhagavaṃs tathāgatena bodhiḥ prāptā /
S04jnalokau:798: tatra katamad bhagavan mūlaṃ katamat pratiṣṭhānam /
S04jnalokau:801: tat tathāgatena mañjuśrīr bodhisamatayā sarvadharmasamatā jñātā /
S04jnalokau:802: tasmād ucyate mañjuśrīr amūlāpratiṣṭhānā tathāgatena bodhir abhisaṃbuddheti //
S04jnalokau:809: cakśur mañjuśrīḥ śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca,
S04jnalokau:812: sa cakṣuḥ śūnyam iti parijñāya rūpeṣu na dhāvati,
S04jnalokau:814: evaṃ śrotraṃ śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca,
S04jnalokau:817: sa śrotraṃ śūnyam iti parijñāya śabdeṣu na dhāvati,
S04jnalokau:822: sa ghrāṇaṃ śūnyam iti parijñāya gandheṣu na dhāvati,
S04jnalokau:827: sa jihvā śūnyeti parijñāya raseṣu na [JĀA_55] dhāvati,
S04jnalokau:832: sa kāyaṃ śūnyam iti parijñāya spraṣṭavyeṣu na dhāvati,
S04jnalokau:834: mano mañjuśrīḥ śūnyam ātmanā cātmīyena ca,
S04jnalokau:837: sa manaḥ śūnyam iti parijñāya dharmeṣu na dhāvati,
S04jnalokau:854: tathā cāvatārṣīd yathā tathatāyā nāpāraṃ na pāraṃ samanupaśyati /
S04jnalokau:877: bodhir mañjuśrīr nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā tryadhvasamā trimaṇḍalaparicchinnā /
S04jnalokau:882: sa cittamanovijñānāpratiṣṭhito na kalpayati na vikalpayati /
S04jnalokau:883: anavakalpayann avikalpayan nātītaṃ karoty anāgataṃ na manyate pratyutpannaṃ na prapañcayati //
S04jnalokau:893: yan mañjuśrīr na cittamanovijñānavijñeyaṃ tad asaṃskṛtam /
S04jnalokau:894: asaṃskṛtam ucyate yatra notpādo na sthitir na vyayaḥ /
S04jnalokau:919: bodhir mañjuśrīr na kāyenābhisambudhyate na cittena /
S04jnalokau:922: cittaṃ ca māyopamaṃ riktaṃ tuccham abhūtam asaṃskṛtam /
S04jnalokau:923: yo mañjuśrīr evaṃ kāyasya cittasya cāvabodhaḥ,
S04jnalokau:927: na mañjuśrīr bodhiḥ kāyena vā cittena vā dharmeṇa vā adharmeṇa vā bhūtena vābhūtena vā satyena vā mṛṣā vā vacanīyā //
S04jnalokau:931: na mañjuśrīr bodhiḥ kiñcit sthānaṃ yena ca vyavahāraṃ gacchet /
S04jnalokau:932: yathā mañjuśrīr ākāśasthānam asaṃskṛtam anutpannam aniruddham avacanīyaṃ tathā mañjuśrīr bodhir asaṃskṛtāsthānānutpannāniruddhāvacanīyā /
S04jnalokau:933: yathā mañjuśrīr bhūtaṃ parigaveṣyamāṇaṃ sarvadharmair avacanīyam,
S04jnalokau:934: evam eva mañjuśrīr bodhir bhūtā parigaveṣyamāṇā sarvadharmair avacanīyā /
S04jnalokau:948: abhisaṃbudhya cakṣuṣo 'nanugrahāya rūpānupalabdhitaś cakṣurvijñānaṃ na pratiṣṭhitam /
S04jnalokau:954: tenāpratiṣṭhitavijñānas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddha iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati //
S04jnalokau:956: katamāni catvāri yad uta rūpaṃ sattvānāṃ cittasya pratiṣṭhānam /
S04jnalokau:957: evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā mañjuśrīḥ sattvānāṃ cittasya pratiṣṭhānam /
S04jnalokau:958: tāni khalu punar imāni mañjuśrīś catvāri cittasya pratiṣṭhānāni tathāgatenānutpannāny aniruddhānīti jñātāni //
S04jnalokau:960: bodhir iti mañjuśrīḥ śūnyatāyā etad adhivacanam /
S04jnalokau:961: yayā śūnyatayā mañjuśrīr bodhiḥ śūnyā tayā śūnyatayā mañjuśrīḥ sarvadharmāḥ śūnyāḥ /
S04jnalokau:964: api tu khalu punar mañjuśrīr ekanayam etad yad uta śūnyatā vā bodhir vā /
S04jnalokau:965: yatra mañjuśrīr na śūnyatā na bodhiḥ,
S04jnalokau:966: na tatra mañjuśrīḥ kiṃcid dvayaṃ yena dvayena śūnyatā vā bodhir vā dvidhākriyate /
S04jnalokau:968: advayā mañjuśrīḥ sarvadharmā alakṣaṇā advaidhīkārā anāmāno 'nimittāś cittamanovijñānāpagatā anutpannā aniruddhā [JĀA_61] anācārā apracārā asamudācārā anakṣarā aghoṣāḥ //
S04jnalokau:969: yat punar ucyate mañjuśrīḥ śūnyam iti,
S04jnalokau:971: na punar atra mañjuśrīḥ paramārthataḥ kaścid dharma upalabhyate yaḥ śūnyam ity ucyate /
S04jnalokau:972: yathā mañjuśrīr ākāśam ākāśam ity ucyate,
S04jnalokau:974: evam eva mañjuśrīḥ śūnyaṃ śūnyam ity ucyate,
S04jnalokau:976: anāmakā mañjuśrīḥ sarvadharmānām ataś ca vyākriyante /
S04jnalokau:977: na mañjuśrīr nāma deśasthaṃ na pradeśasthaṃ /
S04jnalokau:979: nāmnā yo dharmo 'bhilapyate so 'pi dharmo na deśastho na pradeśasthaḥ /
S04jnalokau:980: evam ete mañjuśrīḥ sarvadharmās tathāgatena jñātā ādita evājātā anutpannā aniruddhā alakṣaṇāś cittamanovijñānāpagatā anakṣarā aghoṣāḥ /
S04jnalokau:985: ākāśaṃ ca na samaṃ na [JĀA_62] viṣamaṃ bodhir api na samā na viṣamā /
S04jnalokau:987: yasya mañjuśrīr dharmasya na bhūtapariniṣpattir nāsau samo na viṣamo vā vaktavya iti /
S04jnalokau:988: hi mañjuśrīs tathāgatena sarvadharmā asamā aviṣamā abhisaṃbuddhāḥ /
S04jnalokau:989: tathā cābhisaṃbuddhā athāṇur api na samīkṛto na viṣamīkṛtaḥ /
S04jnalokau:990: yādṛśā eva te dharmāḥ tādṛśā eva vijñātāḥ /
S04jnalokau:991: bhūtajñānena katamac ca mañjuśrīḥ sarvadharmā anutpannāniruddhāḥ,
S04jnalokau:995: asvāmikā aparigrahāś ca mañjuśrīḥ prati vigacchanti /
S04jnalokau:996: iti hi mañjuśrīḥ saṃbhavanti vibhavanti ca pratītya dharme vartante na cātra kaścid vartayitā /
S04jnalokau:997: tad ucyate dharmopacchedāya tathāgato dharmaṃ deśayatīti //
S04jnalokau:1002: yathā bodhis tathā rūpaṃ tathatān na vyativartate /
S04jnalokau:1003: yathā bodhis tathā vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānaṃ tathatān na vyativartate /
S04jnalokau:1004: yathā bodhis tathā pṛthivīdhātus tathatān na vyativartate /
S04jnalokau:1005: [JĀA_63] yathā bodhis tathāpdhātus tejodhātus tathatān na vyativartate /
S04jnalokau:1006: yathā bodhis tathā cakṣurdhātū rūpadhātuś cakṣurvijñānadhātus tathatān na vyativartate /
S04jnalokau:1007: yathā hi mañjuśrīr bodhis tathā śrotradhātuḥ śabdadhātuḥ śrotravijñānadhātuḥ,
S04jnalokau:1011: manodhātur dharmadhātur manovijñānadhātus tathatān na vyativartante /
